name: Open Risk Manual
description: An open online repository of information for risk management

SDGs.evidenceText: The manual links risk management to major professional and sector classifications and taxonomies  (ISCO / NACE / EU Taxonomy)
The manual aims to comprehensively document the concepts, risks and opportunities of sustainable finance in dedicated catagories
The specialized nature of the risk management knowledge base is not served fully by either the traditional academic literature or classic publications in printed book form
